mapper.select: select pas.row_id as vehicleId , pcvp.relation_type_cd as relationship , pas.renavam_code__c as hmbRenavamCode , pas.latestmileage__c as currenMileage , pas.carregistrationnumber__c as vehicleLicenseNumber , pas.serialnumber as serialNumber , pas.name as fscOcn , pas.manufacturedate as manufactureYear , pas.modelname__c as model , pas.modelyear__c as modelYear , pas.vehicleinternalcolor__c as internalColorCode , pas.vehiclecolor__c as externalColorCode , pas.hexawarrantyflag__c as hexaWarrantyFlag , pas.account_row_id__c as dealerId , pcvp.retail_date as retailDt , (select corporaterepresentativename__c from process.account where row_id = account_row_id__c) as salesRepId , (select lastname from process.account where row_id = contact_row_id__c) as salesRepLastName , (select firstname from process.account where row_id = contact_row_id__c) as salesReFirstName , pci.val as operatingStatus from process.asset pas join process.customer_vehicle pcvp on pas.row_id = pcvp.asset_id and pcvp.cv_type = 'Person' left join process.color_information pci on pci.name_code = pas.oper_status_cd__c and pci.type = 'OPERATING_STATUS' and pci.lang_id__c = 'PTB' where pas.serialnumber = #{serialNumber}
select pcp.row_id as campaignId , pcp.type__c as type , pcp.name as campaignName from process.campaign pcp where pcp.name = #{campaignName}

select pam.integration_id as integrationId , pam.asset_id as assetId , pas.serialnumber , (select dealercode__c from process.account where row_id = pam.dealer_id) as dealerCustomerSap , pam.research_date as date , pam.status as status , pam.research_name as description , pam.sra_sr_id as spId , psr.protocol__c as srNumber from process.amaro pam left join process.asset pas on pam.asset_id = pas.row_id left join process.service_request psr on pam.sra_sr_id = psr.row_id where pas.serialnumber = #{serialNumber}

select legacycreateddate__c as srCreated , protocol__c as srNumber , dealercode__c as dealerCode , relatedmodel__c as modelCar , version__c as vehicleVersion , quote_color__c as vehicleColor , quotetransmission__c as engTrans , voc_class as area from process.service_request psr where contact_row_id__c = #{contactId}
